Field.Heading: Frequency
Field.Help: The frequency determines the number of provisionings pr week. Default is 7.

Field.Heading: Spread
Field.Help: The spread factor determines the random spread of the periodic interval. If left blank the default spread factor is 50, in other words 50% randomization of the periodic interval (both shorter and longer). Set it to 0 to avoid any randomization of the interval.
